items.sentence: Tom and Mary walked for a long time along a country road.
Tom\'s leg had gone to sleep so he was unable to stand up.
Tom\'s mother chased Tom as he ran naked around the lobby.
Tom is the only person in the office who can speak French.
Tom is the only student in our class who can speak French.
Tom is unlikely to tell you the truth about what happened.
It makes no difference to me whether you are rich or poor.
I can\'t just leave. I have to tell the boss I\'m leaving.
Tom deposited three hundred dollars in his saving account.
Tom did his best to persuade Mary to babysit his children.
